content: वास् {vI.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (वासयति-ते) {@--1@} To scent, perfume, incense, fumigate, make fragrant; वासिताननविशेषितगंधा <ls>Ki. 9. 60</ls>; प्रकाटतपटवासैर्वासयन् काननानि <ls>Gīt. 1</ls>; <ls>U. 3. 16</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 74</ls>; <ls>Me. 20</ls>; <ls>Rs. 5. 5.</ls> {@--2@} To steep, infuse. {@--3@} To spice, season. {vII.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> See वाश्.
